item.title: Project Management Software for Course Development
item.description: Project management applications are either expensive or time-consuming to configure and customize for your team (I’m looking at you spreadsheets!). In a team environment, using spreadsheets or other offline files can be tricky for access with multiple users opening and saving the same file, resulting in “conflicted file” errors. To solve this problem, I developed a secure web application to track course development projects for agile and waterfall-based projects. The application uses C# .
